name: Minerva
title: Modular On-Demand Apparel Platform
tagline: Design it. We make it. Delivered on demand.

background.headline: Fragmented and Inefficient Apparel Customization Market
background.summary: The custom clothing market struggles with inventory bloat, slow turnaround, and limited personalization. Existing platforms offer few options and rely heavily on pre-made stock or expensive in-house production.
background.insight: Minerva reimagines apparel manufacturing as a modular, digital-first process where customers dictate every variable while supply chains stay lean and responsive.

structuralChallenges: Limited SKU options in most print-on-demand platforms constrain creativity.
Excess inventory of niche fabrics or sizes ties up capital.
Factories lack standardization for custom multi-parameter orders.
Lead times increase when rare combinations are requested.
Quality control is inconsistent across decentralized suppliers.
Digital-to-physical workflows are manual, error-prone, or incompatible with multiple print methods.
Scaling personalization is operationally complex without a structured system.

marketOpportunity.insight: Consumers increasingly demand highly personalized apparel. Brands and marketplaces want to offer customization without overstock or overhead. Minerva connects these needs through a modular production matrix.
dataPoints: Custom clothing market projected to reach $10B by 2027 (MarketWatch).
Over 60% of consumers prefer personalized products (Epsilon Research).

solution.headline: A Digital-First Modular Apparel System
solution.description: Minerva allows users to design clothes across multiple parameters—fabric type, quality, fiber thickness, size, and print method—while automatically generating standardized production commands sent to global supply chains.

coreFeatures.title: Interactive Design Matrix
coreFeatures.text: Customers pick fabric, quality, thickness, size, and decoration type, creating virtually unlimited product permutations.

coreFeatures.title: Automated Production Tickets
coreFeatures.text: Each order translates to a clear SKU code + user design file + production instructions, eliminating factory guesswork.

coreFeatures.title: On-Demand vs Pre-Made Strategy
coreFeatures.text: Popular combinations are stocked; rare or premium variants are manufactured only when ordered.

coreFeatures.title: Multi-Method Print & Decoration
coreFeatures.text: Supports ink, embroidery, sublimation, DTF, and more, routed to facilities with compatible machinery.

coreFeatures.title: Centralized Quality Control
coreFeatures.text: Photo verification and error tracking ensure consistent production standards across all suppliers.

coreFeatures.title: Dynamic Supply Chain Routing
coreFeatures.text: Orders are sent to the nearest node with correct stock and equipment, optimizing cost and delivery time.

coreFeatures.title: Scalable SKU Matrix
coreFeatures.text: The modular approach turns complexity into a competitive advantage, enabling thousands of unique product combinations without inefficiency.

vision.title: Strategic Vision: Personalized Apparel, Simplified

principles.title: Modularity as Advantage
principles.description: Structured SKU matrices convert complexity into operational efficiency and consumer choice.

principles.title: Lean Supply Chains
principles.description: Pre-stock only popular blanks; fulfill rarities on demand to reduce waste and costs.

principles.title: Digital-First Production
principles.description: Automated tickets, validation, and routing ensure error-free, scalable manufacturing.

principles.title: Consumer Empowerment
principles.description: Users control every design variable without compromise on quality or speed.

vision.summary: Minerva transforms apparel customization from chaotic and slow into scalable, lean, and highly personalized.

expectedImpact: SKU management becomes systematic, reducing production errors by up to 50%.
Lead times for custom garments reduced by 40–60%.
Customer satisfaction increases through expanded personalization options.

whyNow: Rapid growth of online custom apparel and print-on-demand market.
Technologies for digital design, file validation, and automated routing are mature.
Global supply chains are ready to support modular fulfillment.
Consumer demand for personalization is peaking, creating a first-mover advantage.
